summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Plat 12E, Page 56 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone certain property located at 719 Market Street from Low-rise 1 (L-1) to Neighborhood Commercial 1/30 foot height limit (NC1/30') Zone, and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. Petition of Greg Borba; C.F. 294977).
